00009 namespace VFS {
00010 
00018 class MangleArchive : public Ogre::Archive
00019 {
00020   VFSPtr vfs;
00021 
00022  public:
00023   MangleArchive(VFSPtr _vfs, const std::string &name,
00024                 const std::string &archType = "Mangle")
00025     : Ogre::Archive(name, archType)
00026     , vfs(_vfs)
00027   {}
00028 
00029   bool isCaseSensitive() const { return vfs->isCaseSensitive; }
00030 
00031   // These do nothing. You have to load / unload the archive in the
00032   // constructor/destructor.
00033   void load() {}
00034   void unload() {}
00035 
00036   bool exists(const Ogre::String& filename)
00037     { return vfs->isFile(filename); }
00038 
00039   time_t getModifiedTime(const Ogre::String& filename)
00040     { return vfs->stat(filename)->time; }
00041 
00042   // With both these we support both OGRE 1.6 and 1.7
00043   Ogre::DataStreamPtr open(const Ogre::String& filename) const;
00044   Ogre::DataStreamPtr open(const Ogre::String& filename, bool readOnly) const
00045   { return open(filename); }
00046 
00047   Ogre::StringVectorPtr list(bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false);
00048   Ogre::FileInfoListPtr listFileInfo(bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false);
00049 
00050   // Find functions will only work if vfs->hasFind is set.
00051   Ogre::StringVectorPtr find(const Ogre::String& pattern, bool recursive = true,
00052                              bool dirs = false);
00053   Ogre::FileInfoListPtr findFileInfo(const Ogre::String& pattern,
00054                                      bool recursive = true,
00055                                      bool dirs = false);
